description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9aoln","text":"This protocol describes a method to detect ubiquitination on a protein of interest. This technique relies on immunoprecipitation (IP) of ubiquitinated proteins from a cell lysate through the use of an anti-ubiquitin nanobody coupled to agarose beads. The eluate can be run on SDS-PAGE to determine whether the protein of interest was recovered in the IP and, therefore, ubiquitinated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
